#  Signing up and signing in at Causal Map

Start your journey at https://causalmap.shinyapps.io/CausalMap2/.

You can sign in with a Google account.

If you have a paid subscription, however you sign in, make sure the associated email is the same as the one for which you have a subscription. There are a variety of options when it comes to subscriptions, so have a [look](https://causalmap.app/subscriptions/) and find the one that is right for you.

If someone has [shared files](#xpermissions) with you, however you sign in, make sure the associated email is the one the files were shared to.
